fullText: Bryan Cranston gives a powerhouse performance as Howard Beale, the unhinged news anchor in this riveting revival of Lee Hall's adaptation of Paddy Chayefsky's screenplay.
dtliExcerpt: Bryan Cranston gives a powerhouse performance as Howard Beale, the unhinged news anchor in this riveting revival of Lee Hall's adaptation of Paddy Chayefsky's screenplay.
